name: Residential Living
description: In 2019, the Pomeroy Center and Helpers Community, Inc. formed a partnership to open two residential homes for up to 11 adults with intellectual disabilities, plus on-site staff. Helpers own the properties, and Pomeroy leases, staffs, and populates the homes, which are located across from Golden Gate Park.
